title: 820-2936 Green light not booting
message:
Hi guys I have a Macbook Pro 820-2936 that had liquid damage at U2800 area mainly on C2810 so I replaced that one and I have 3.24v there stable. When connecting the charger I get a green light but no orange. Fan spins for a second and stop and restarts every few seconds. When connecting only a battery light goes off and the same happens.

PPBUS_G3H  =   16.54
PP3V42_G3H =   3.43 (Also on SMC_BC_ACOK, 3.43 goes to adapter)
PP5V_S5 = 5v
PP5V_S3 = pulsing 0-5v
PP3v3_S5  = 3.34
PP3v3_S4  =  3.34 pulsing
PPVCC_S0_CPU = no CPU VCore
ALL_SYS_PWRGD = pulsing from 0-3.3v

I have a short to ground on L7520. Since there was liquid near the PCH could it be crap under the PCH?

title: 820-2936 Green light not booting
message: R7402 is 90.6k so OK. Will see if a reflow from SMC helps.
